thread.title: Runners TO YOUR MARKS … Upcoming races & walks
thread.title_full: Runners TO YOUR MARKS … Upcoming races & walks

title: Runners TO YOUR MARKS … Upcoming races & walks
text:
Published: Sun, October 18, 2015 @ 12:00 a.m. 
October 
25 — Youngstown Peace Race at the downtown YMCA. Two-mile run begins at 9:30 a.m. with the 10K at 11. Visit www.peacerace.org. 
31 — United Way Great Pumpkin 5K at Kent State Trumbull, 4314 Mahoning Ave. NW, Warren. Race begins at 9 a.m. Visit gopherarun.com. 
31 — Habitat for Humanity Fright Flight at 785 E. State Street, Salem. Race begins at 9 a.m. Visit www.habitatofncc.org. 
November 
1 — Hilloween Half Marathon at Columbiana High School. Race begins at 7 a.m. Register at www.active.com. 
14 — Fast & Furriest 5K at Waterworth Memorial Park in Salem. Race begins at 9:15 a.m. Visit www.ytownrunners.org. 
21 — Rebel Run 5K at Crestview High. Race begins at 8:30. Visit crestviewrebels.org. 
26 — What We’re Thankful 4 Miler at Second Sole in Boardman. Visit www.secondsoleohio.com. 
26 — Warren Kiwanis Turkey Trot at Kent State Trumbull. Two-mile race at 9 a.m., 5-miler at 10. Visit gopherarun.com or www.warrenkiwanis.org. 
28 — Run for Jamie 5K at the Holy Family Parish, 2729 Center Road in Poland. Race begins at 9:45 a.m. Visit www.runforjamie.org. 
Email race information to sports@vindy or fax to 330-747-6712. Registration forms available for most races at gopherarun.com or www.ytownrunners.org. Other stories of interest
